fields.name: Trick Or Treat Biscuit Gift
fields.description:
To some, Halloween is lifestyle, these are the biscuits we’d buy for them!

Great for gifting or for decorating around a cake to create a stunning Halloween centrepiece.

Every delicious vanilla biscuit is carefully baked using the finest local ingredients, before being individually hand iced with fondant and royal icing.

Our pledge: All our packaging is eco-friendly, we source the best ingredients we possibly can, and a percentage from every sale is donated to our charity partner, 1% For The Planet.
fields.ingredients: Ingredients: British flour [wheat flour, calcium, iron, vitamin B3, vitamin B1. Raising agents: sodium hydrogen carbonate, mono calcium phosphate] British sugar, British butter [milk], golden syrup, Free Range eggs, glucose syrup, RSPO certified sustainable palm oil, humectant: glycerine, emulsifier: mono-and diglycerides of fatty acids, vanilla flavouring, stabiliser: carboxy methyl cellulose, preservative: potassium sorbate, colourings.

fields.name: Birthday Cake Biscuit Gift
fields.description:
Celebrate their wins no matter how small, with a shimmery biscuit cake complete with everlasting lit candles (until they’re eaten of course).

Carefully packed into a recycled gift box, all our packaging is compostable and recyclable and will fit through a standard letterbox.

Our pledge: All our packaging is eco-friendly, we source the best ingredients we possibly can, and a percentage from every sale is donated to our charity partner, 1% For The Planet.
fields.ingredients: Ingredients: British flour [wheat flour, calcium, iron, vitamin B3, vitamin B1. fields.name: Monster Hugs Biscuit Gift
fields.description:
Probably the only monster you’d want to invite into your home this year! Great for children gifting to their parent, grandparent or totally roarsome friend.


Carefully packed into a recycled gift box, all our packaging is compostable and recyclable and will fit through a standard letterbox.

Our pledge: All our packaging is eco-friendly, we source the best ingredients we possibly can, and a percentage from every sale is donated to our charity partner, 1% For The Planet.

Raising agents: sodium hydrogen carbonate, mono calcium phosphate] British sugar, British butter [milk], golden syrup, Free Range eggs, glucose syrup, RSPO certified sustainable palm oil, humectant: glycerine, emulsifier: mono-and diglycerides of fatty acids, vanilla flavouring, stabiliser: carboxy methyl cellulose, preservative: potassium sorbate, colourings.

fields.name: Spooky Biscuit Set
fields.description:
Beautifully hand iced not-so-spooky biscuits!

Every delicious vanilla biscuit is carefully baked using the finest local ingredients, before being individually hand iced.

Each biscuit is packed into a recycled (and recyclable) gift box.

Our pledge: All our packaging is eco-friendly, we source the best ingredients we possibly can, and a percentage from every sale is donated to our charity partner, 1% For The Planet.
